channel.title: Custom buttons
channel.description: How do I change the default ones, Ill show you a picture of what I mean: [IMG]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/9600/clientny4.jpg[/img] I need to know how to change those so they can be similar to the login box.

item.title: Custom buttons
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

Not the text, the actual button, and I have looked through my client.java. But im not that good with clients so I could of well missed something.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 08-04-2008, 12:47:39[/size][hr]TuT on this please? Or at least some assistance.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom buttons
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Open up your client.Java, then press ctrl & F and search for those things you want to edit.
